history.title: Born from research. Forged by a mission.
history.p1: It all started in 2018. VerifDoc was born following the first prize of a prestigious call for projects launched by the International Institute of Digital Criminology Studies (INEC).
history.p2: The objective was clear and ambitious: to design an integrated environment for detecting forged digital images. Faced with the rise of scientific and document disinformation, a tool was needed to separate the true from the false.
history.p3: What was initially a cutting-edge research project for the scientific community has become an industrial reference. Today, we carry this legacy of excellence in every analysis performed by our AI.

footer.disclaimer: VerifDoc Intelligence Inc. provides advanced AI-based security solutions designed to help companies improve compliance and fraud detection and prevention efforts. While we strive to ensure the accuracy and reliability of our solutions, VERIFDOC does not guarantee the detection or prevention of all fraudulent activities or compliance issues.
